website_summaries.verdict: A bargain. These mats get the job done, protecting grill grates and yielding great BBQ, for nearly half the cost.
pros: The mats are thin enough to produce desired grill marks, but sturdy enough to stand up to 500 degrees
Good for indoor or outdoor use
Easy to clean and dishwasher safe

customer_reviews.title: I like to keep a simple on my reviews and only ...
customer_reviews.text: I like to keep a simple on my reviews and only answer what people really care about. I do not do pictures or videos as I have a job and this does not pay my bills, it is just a way to help the regular Joe like me make an informed decision. I do not get free or discounted products for review, you will get my unbiased review of product. Does it work? Yes, I bought this to place vegetables and other items that would other wise fall through the grates, it works well for that. Is it easy to use? Yes Pros: Works as intended Cons: None Note: Be careful when handling
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical but WOW
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of these but my boyfriend was in some kick and I figured for $12.99 what the heck. Used them the night I received for steak and mushrooms and they were amazing!! I never had better grilled veggies!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you grill
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE MATS!!! I grill all the time and this is the best thing I have ever used to grill everything!! No flare ups or veggies falling through the grate. I grilled burgers, steaks, shrimp and fish all had grill marks and evenly cooked no charred bits. The veggies were awesome to cook all accounted for, no loss. Cleanings a breeze I just soak in soapy water and give a good scrubbing or just toss in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Jake

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use Easy to clean Still gets those bbq marks without direct flame When the sauce drips just wipe it out then done The best thing about this mat is as if there's no mat the bbq feeling and taste is still there and it's safer and no need to wrap the public grill with foil or something and no fear of getting those metal scrub into your food and no fear of putting your food on top of a dirty grill
customer_reviews.author: Pros and/or ConsTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works perfectly and larger than other product ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works perfectly and larger than other product offer grill mats. Grilled up lamb chops two nights ago. Grill marks perfect. No flare ups.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE TO BBQ AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE to BBQ, but I HATE cleaning the grill afterwards. As Sweet Brown says: "Ain't nobody got time for that!" So I bought these Aoocan grill mats. They feel pretty durable, and clean up easily with soap and water. Before you ask, "YES! THEY LEAVE THE GRILL MARKS ON YOUR MEAT!" :) so stop dreading the bbq cleanup like I did and just grab a set of these mats and step your grill game up! I broke these mats in with some filet mignon and they tasted amazing! These are affordable for a set of 5 and I they have a lifetime warranty... so you have nothing to lose. Definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: IcePick06

customer_reviews.title: Keep your grill clean!
customer_reviews.text: So far I only used the product once in chicken. The grill got to 400 degrees. The grill mat held up just fine. Wiped clean right after use almost as its brand new. I can totally recommend this may to everyone! I will update after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony John Guerra

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU for replacing my rusty flat pans!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things... I now use them all the time in place of flat pans in the oven. I like that they are extremely easy to clean, take up minimal space in the dishwasher and I dont have to worry about rust or toxicity from nonstick pans! These are must haves for people who cook and want to avoid the excessive stuck on food on grills and flat pans.
customer_reviews.author: Lady K

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your grill clean, washes up easily
customer_reviews.text: These mats heat up perfectly and they do leave nice grill marks. I made steaks on sunday for my son and I The steaks came out perfectly with nice grill marks, I also threw some green onions on there... PERFECT! and they don't fall through the grates. Sliced some itatian bread, drizzled some olive oil on the slices and hit them with a little salt and pepper and they toasted beautifully, Of course they were extra good because the got cooked steak juice on them.Cleaning the mats is much easier than cleaning the cast iron grill grates, just make sure you give them a proper wiping off with a paper towel before placing them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Levi K.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I really like these mats. Veggies don't drop into grill. Grill stays cleaner. Food stays moist and cooks faster. I have found that if you wiped off them off immediately after cooking, they stay cleaner longer. My first set I waited until they cooled and then tried to clean them. It didn't work so well. My second set I just take a spatula and paper towel and clean them right away and then wash them off. They stay nicer and much easier to clean. I really like that you can do smaller pieces and they don't drop through the crates.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: They Work As Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I use them in my grill. Two will cover the entire 5 burner grill cooking surface. They prevent the need to constantly scour the stainless steel grill grates, are easy to clean, and can withstand the full heat of my 70,000 BTU grill without problem. Please note that while most of the material left during grilling is left on the mats, the grease from burgers made with fatty meat can still cause a grill fire. While this happened to me (wife wanted to try a new burger supplier who provided very fatty burgers), the grill fire produced a great bit of heat, charring the meat inside of the grill, but there was no damage to the mats.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I like it and would by another but when using on ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it and would by another but when using on a gas grill it's critical that the mat not cover the entire area. If wind blows out the flame the mat holds in the gas and when the flame is reignited the trapped gas can blow up
customer_reviews.author: Amazaholic

customer_reviews.title: Works well and changes the way you grill with one small problem
customer_reviews.text: Its not really a huge problem but its one that can cause issues if your not ready for them. Depending on what you are grilling there will be an issue of pooling grease or fat that will pool up and drip off the sides. That will cause more flares while your grilling and that might be an issue. I like to grill bacon during the summer outside along with my eggs but when I do the fat will pool up and run off the sides and cause some flares.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Young

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean, great for keeping grill clean or grilling cut veggies and whatnot. Food still gets some grill marks with the mat, even with my pellet grill. It does get grill marks on the mat after one use, but have used it a few times w/ out problems...time will tell about its durability...
customer_reviews.author: janak23in

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive way to keep my grill clean!
customer_reviews.text: I got a new grill and I vowed to actually take care of this one and keep it clean (my last grill still lasted over 12 years, it was just very “seasoned”). These silicone mats are great for grilling anything that is messy or might fall thru the grates. I have used them for stuffed chicken breasts and different vegetables. Since this came with 5 mats, I used two on my grill side tables to keep the stainless steel clean too. Worth $11 to keep my grill cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Where have these been all my grilling life??
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought grill mats before thinking they would be rather gimmicky. I purchased these and last night had the most tender chicken perfectly cooked that I have ever grilled. Cleaned right up and I'm doing burgers tonight. And no messy grease. Fantastic product, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Roger G. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended grill mats
customer_reviews.text: These mats are a must have. We bought these and sent them to California to grill freshly caught halibut. We love the taste of grilling food, but hate losing food to the grill. This may helped the fish cook evenly and kept the juices in. Then, we took 1 mat to Colorado (it saved the meal). We were to cook fajita meat on a grill. On a grill without a mat, would be been terrible. Instead we were able to get the grill flavor without losing all the meat to the stickiness of the grill. Because this was witnessed by so many, our friends and family are getting these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Great concept
customer_reviews.text: I am a major Q'er and this product is fantastic for all foods where the grids present a challenge. Scalllops, veggies, fish, etc. It has dramatically increased my options!
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Butwin

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.text: Five of these came in the package. I kept one and gave one to each of my kids. We all love the fact that there is no grill clean-up! The flavor and the grill marks come through, but the grill itself is sparkling clean. And cleaning the Grill Mate is super easy to do!
customer_reviews.author: SherGib1946

customer_reviews.title: Not only for the grill.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy these for our grill. I ordered them because I wanted one to line my electric stove oven bottom. The manufacturer said not to use foil in the bottom of the oven even though there is no heating element down there. I always did use foil in my oven. Oh well, I did put one of these in my new oven for spills. Can't use regular oven cleaners also, but this has me covered. Reusable, washable and nothing is supposed to stick.
customer_reviews.author: T.TTop Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: Great idea slight flaws but not a dealbreaker
customer_reviews.text: I have come to depend on these mats for grilling. It has definitely saved my outdoor grill from a lot of mess. I will say though that the idea that it is non-stick is a little miss leading. I find that they easily get crusty and difficult to completely clean each time. I put up with it because of the overall convenience and I am trying to use more spray nonstick oil on it first to help mitigate the crusty issues. I have recommended them to other friends and they like them too.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thornwell Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Mats
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! We throw cut up veggies on here all the time. We have also put meat on here. It always cooks great. Cleanup is super easy too - everything just wipes off! One time my partner forgot to bring this in after grilling and I found it amongst our bushes the next day. Even after being outside all night and in the dirt, it was still easy to clean. So far I have only used one mat over and over and it's worked fine. Having a pack of five is nice as I know it will last me a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: These things work like MAGIC!
customer_reviews.text: I still do NOT understand how these things transfer the grill lines onto whatever it is you are grilling but these things are better than sliced bread! This pack of 5 mats is a bargain and WELL WORTH every penny. I've purchased one in the past and used it all season long. They work best if you remove them from the grill after each use and wash them, but it isn't necessary. May be why I had to buy more, but I am very happy with these. It prevents items from sticking to the grill, cuts down on the mess, and the items really do get the grill marks. Just AMAZING. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: These are the greatest invention for bbq-ing
customer_reviews.text: These are the greatest invention for bbq-ing. Especially if you gas grill burns unevenly like mine does. This solves all uneven charring, still get grill marks, amazing especially for fish where it's like grilling in a pan. I even cut one up and made a round non-stick omelette cooker for my frying pan (leaving a tab at each end to pull together when eggs set), where you can cook your omelette over very low heat, covered till it gets firm and then pull the tabs together and lay it on a plate and the omelette just slides off. Also cleaning them is easy and fast, with even the most cooked on charred marinades. Truly the best new summer item!
customer_reviews.author: Ann L.

customer_reviews.title: A Grilling Must !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering these grill mats. I cant explain how important it is grill with these mats. Whatever you're grilling will taste 10 times better. I usually grill chicken breasts on these bad bays. Keeps moisture and flavor in without the bland dry taste of regular grilling. The only downside is the cleaning part to be honest, otherwise these are great. I highly recommend these mats for personal use and for gift ideas as well.
customer_reviews.author: ALEX G.

customer_reviews.title: This works well, I've recommended them to friends.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with these. Honestly surprised how well they work. With the right heat going you do get grill marks. Keeps the grill clean. I rinse them off and wash them in the dishwasher. Saves me about 15 minutes of grill cleaning everytime. Highly recommend these for anyone with a grill. Give them as a gift and you will be invited over for BBQ's for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Black Heavy Duty Grill Mats
customer_reviews.text: We have used the copper grill mats before and they work great, but we wanted to try the black ones. They are a little thicker (at least the ones we got) and can hold that heavy meat. We got them before 4th of July weekend, so we got some good use out of them. I think we will stick to copper for seafood and veggies and the black for the meats. They were easy to clean according to my husband. Food straight on a pit is the best, but these grill mats give you options. Would totally buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Deloris P.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could use this map for more than one time, NO. After the first time I cooked my NY steaks, I watched it with soap but it ripped. Couldn't use again. Second time, I used it to cook chicken and it looked good after it was used. Reused again for cooking chicken again, it was totally burned when I hit up the grill. Not able to use second time. If I can only use this one time, I would rather use the grill and watch it from time to time. Totally not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money...caught fire on a low grill setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Najafi

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I've ordered these mats. They are easy to use and prevent me from having to clean my grill grates every time that I grill.
customer_reviews.author: DMR

customer_reviews.title: Protect your food from flare-ups!
customer_reviews.text: Very Handy to have, I ordered these to replace some that have worn out. They're great for grilling vegetables (& even fruit- try peaches with cinnamon!!), but they don't seem to last longer than a single season. We've gone through several sets of them.
customer_reviews.author: Budget101

customer_reviews.title: Loved it when we used it
customer_reviews.text: Loved it when we used it; great grill marks came through on the meat, grease stayed on the mat and didn't fuel the fire. Unfortunately after one use it disintegrated in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: A great product !!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that even after reading the many positive reviews on these that I was still skeptical about the performance of these grill mats. It doesn't matter how much you spend on a gas grill, they all eventually have those annoying flare ups. These mats completely eliminate flareups. The food tastes exactly the same using these mats as it would cooking on a traditional cooking grate. The food still gets the grill mark lines. They are also completely non stick. When using more than one make sure you over lap them a little to avoid open areas where a flare up may occur. They are wash up easily. Just a great overall product.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: makes cleaning grill so much easier, excellent investment in my opinion. you get enough on the box you can throw them away every time and still get many uses out of it, but the material is easily cleanable stuff doesn't stick to it and wipes right off. light scrubbing and they look like new. food cooks just as it would without them in between and still leaves grill marks in meat
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Just as advertized!
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I love these little sheets for grilling, but I love the fact that they can be cut and shaped easily with a pair of normal scissors! I use them on my stove-top cast-iron grill, and I was able to trim a sheet to an exact fit for it! Clean-up is a breeze! Heat transfer is perfect; grill-marks on food are just as if I weren't even using it! Their so durable that I only need a few; I gave the rest to my daughter for her grill! A great product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lody

customer_reviews.title: Alleviate the mess
customer_reviews.text: These mats really help keep my grill cleaner, than if I grilled directly on the grills. I gave the mats only a 4 star on sturdiness, only because if you place them on the grill when the temperature is over 450 degrees, it will bubble up, so you have to be careful there. They are great to use. I have had several guest over and they thought they were so good, they went and bought some for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: JimC

customer_reviews.title: This mats are amazing to cook on.  And the work in the oven also.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these but not this particular order and I love d them so much and I told the family where I board my horse and they have two homes and do a lot of barbecuing. So I managed to find this set of 5 for them so I bought these for them. They also loved them. I also told my best grilfriend about them and she bought some for she and her husband in Upper Michigan. She also told me they love cooking on them.
customer_reviews.author: LSmith

customer_reviews.title: Work Better, Cost Less
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try these after using (and liking) the Kitchen Home brand mats because these were far less money per mat. I was expecting junk but HELLO, they actually work better and clean up much easier than the more expensive brand. They come five in a pack and my first pair (enough to cover my grill) are used almost daily and are showing no signs of wear. Very good product, very fair price; fast, free, delivery. What's mot to love??!! Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Can grill anything with this mat!
customer_reviews.text: I placed diced onions, mushrooms then hamburger pattie on mat, everything stayed on mat and didn't fall through. Burgers had grill marks but were cooked on the mat. I have learned to let the mat cool, fold in half and rub together over garbage can. This helps with the cleaning. Place in sink of soapy water, set for 15 minutes then scrub off. I have ordered several for friends with my approval!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: The first grill pad we tried was great. Hope they are durable. First tryout on some thick cut pork loin center cuts turned out awesome. Retained juices/flavor. No flare ups. Grill marks like meat was over open grill flame. Pleased with the product. Cheap at around a couple of dollars each. Although some reviews stated clean up was tedious, we found it easy. We simply let it soak in soapy water for a few minutes and it cleaned up without a fuss. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have used it a few times. I grilled some honey lime chicken on it, chicken did not stick and my grill was protected. The honey usually leaves a carmelized, black mess on the grill or pan, but the nastiness just slid right off the mat when I rinsed it. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: EJR123

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't grill without them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these grill mats. Aside from keeping the grill clean, it is so easy to cook veggies and not have them fall through the grates of the grill. Yes, they get grill marks just as if they are on the grill. I soak them in soapy water if bbq sauce or something sticky dries on them and they clean up easy. I dry them with a dish towel or paper towel and then let air dry before putting away.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly W.

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. It does everything it claimed. My personal experience is: It is very easy to clean, hardly anything sticks to this mat. I thought it would block some heat coming through, on the contrary, you get aburn pattern just as if you had it directly on the grill. No more cleaning of those grill grates for me. Another point is that it remains perfectly flat and don't curl with the heat. This product is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Really Slick!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to try these on the grill yet (thanks, rain!), but I've used them on baking sheets in the oven. They have worked great. Even sticky cheese just wiped right off. I think they will save a lot of money over time by not using parchment or foil all the time. I wish the instructions had indicated if you could cut them safely, as I would like to shape them to fit different things. If anyone knows, please post the info. Otherwise, I'm very happy with the mats & the great price!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S. Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Crispy wings on the bbq
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make crispy chicken wings on the bbq. They don’t stick to this thing but they do stick to the bbq and that’s a big problem. It’s spectacular. I put about 25 wings on it drizzle olive oil on them and then turn them about 20 minutes in. Super crispy and then I toss them in franks red hot and butter. Perfect. I’m not sure how these things work but hey, technology!
customer_reviews.author: Way Easy

customer_reviews.title: Never pan fry inside again!
customer_reviews.text: This item is amazing. I love my kitchen clean and pan frying fish stinks my house. I decided to buy this a year ago and it was so amazing, this is my 2nd set. I’ve been gifting to family and friends. It’s a cook’s dream, no inside kitchen mess to clean, or small of food in the house (I like my house smelling like flowers). This did it! No mess to clean up, nonstick and nonstick doesn’t go away after lots of use. It’s amazing! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Giang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for kitchen or grill
customer_reviews.text: We use these all the time for: 1) Grilling vegetables (and some fruit) - they don't get grill gunk and they don't fall through the cracks 2) Grilling Lamb - directs the grease away from the meat so the grill is less likely to catch fire. 3) Cooling cookies - Cookies don't stick and unlike wax paper these are totally reusable. 4) Baking frozen pizza - lets heat hit the crust but without allowing cheese to drip into the bottom of the oven
customer_reviews.author: NeoCowboy

customer_reviews.title: Great bbq mats.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used various bbq mats for several years and these are by far the best. Sturdy and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Craddock

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great heat conductor which speeds up and evens out the grilling process. Food tastes good, easy to insert thermometer to check temperature (as opposed to a grill grate). Only issue is that if you want to clean the mats, do it as soon as possible after removing food. Otherwise the residue becomes very hard to clean away.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: They arrived yesterday, just perfect timing for me to try them on the grill. They worked great, especially when I was cooking vegetables (asparagus). I had company over, and they where very impressed with them. So since I had 5 in the pack I gave them two! They where easy to clean. I am looking forward to using them again the next time we bbq.
customer_reviews.author: Herb  and Donna Yost

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, not too hard to clean between uses...at least for about five or six times between the two sides. Depending on what you cook it can last even longer. Cooks great, leaves grill marks without the burning flame. We use it for beef, pork, fish, chicken. Even did a quick sear of ahi tuna that came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Turner

customer_reviews.title: A Good Find
customer_reviews.text: We have used copper mats on our gas grill for almost a year. These are quality and have been durable (reusable). Depending on what you grill determines whether they can be wiped and cleaned in the dishwasher. Good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Sentryone

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only had 1 chance to use it so far. I will update if anything changes the more use I get out of it. Was simple, made easy clean up, food didn't really stick so that's good. I knocked one star off due to box being torn completely open upon arrival. If I wanted to give it as I gift, I couldn't because of that. But overall, good so far!
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Grill Mat Believer
customer_reviews.text: Just wrapped up my first grilling using the mats. I was able to cook my Ribeyes like I was cooking on a flat iron grill. The fat stays on the mat surface and produces a quality sear. No hot spots or flare ups to deal with! Haven't tried to clean up yet. I will adjust the review if that goes bad. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

customer_reviews.title: Worked great with my squash tonight
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous after seeing pics of these mats burnt and melted, but this worked great tonight with squash!! I had all 4 burners on and used 2 mats to cover the whole grill... mixed the squash with olive oil before putting it on to cook. I alternated between having the cover open and closed to control the heat and the cook time to correspond with everything else. I wasn't sure if I'd get the grilled "crispies" which are the best part, but I did and the family said it was great!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Product good; not sure about service.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. Unfortunately, somehow we received (and were charged for two sets) and it costs so much to return it's not worth it. Really didn't like the response that we should find someone to buy the second set from us! Sounded kind of smart-alecky!
customer_reviews.author: owllady2250

customer_reviews.title: great for grilling chicken wings or vegetables or anything that ...
customer_reviews.text: great for grilling chicken wings or vegetables or anything that usually tends to stick to the grill grates or fall through the cracks. We haven't had much success getting a good char on steaks, so I wouldn't recommend it for that use, but otherwise, they are great for grilling. Inexpensive enough to through away after they get too grimey. we have gifted these to our grilling friends multiple times and everyone seems to love them
customer_reviews.author: E's opinion

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! These really work. We use them for everything. You can fry an egg, cook any kind of vegetables or fish. Everything gets grill marks and that "grill" taste, but the mat prevents anything from falling through. Take it with you when using a grill in a park or beach so you do not have to worry about what wild animal has been on the grill before you got there!
customer_reviews.author: Leland Labuguen

customer_reviews.title: The only way to grill
customer_reviews.text: Especially great for items that may fall apart during grilling (i.e., fish and vegetables). Reduces clean up time and keeps grease from dripping into barbecue. Great idea and fantastic gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Lester M. Siglin

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, try them
customer_reviews.text: We have used these for a number of years weekly during the summer Grill times Durability is solid I would try them Wife enjoys grilling Veges, Fish,salmon, burgers, pork loin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work well.
customer_reviews.text: I tried grill mats last year and they wear out after about 30 uses and cleanings - a great deal, considering the savings of time cleaning the grill and grill briquettes and gas burners. This brand seems a bit more sturdy, and should lest at least as long.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Friend

customer_reviews.title: They work very well
customer_reviews.text: Whether on our old rusty grill at home, or the grill on the fire pit when camping, our food cooks well and stays clean. It washes in a jiffy with just a cloth or sponge. We’ve also used it for eggs and toast while camping. I’d definitely buy again, but they don’t seem to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: EElixabeth

customer_reviews.title: happy with these
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Meat and fish get perfectly browned on the bbq and so far everything has stayed super moist as well. I've done pork, chicken and fish.....everything came out perfect. Very easy to clean as well as nothing sticks. Sometimes I use brown sugar in marinades and that can get a little sticky at the end, even this comes right off, no scrubbing required.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Makes grilling easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Got a package for myself and liked it so much that I bought one for my mother and another two for my sisters. It's easy to use and easy to clean. Makes grilling so much easier if you don't have to worry about the cleanup. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Boroujerdi-Rad

customer_reviews.title: Well they look like they would melt away when I got them until ...
customer_reviews.text: Ya ok I bought these thinking they were a joke for my camper for out door cooking. Well they look like they would melt away when I got them until I stuck one on my outdoor grill and it worked to perfection. No mess to clean up no burning off the grill to scrape the gunk off. No flame ups from dripping grease I just removed the mat wiped it with a paper towel and washed in my camper sink. A must have for out door camping
customer_reviews.author: Mike 2

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT...YOU WON'T REGRET IT
customer_reviews.text: First off, as a self-proclaimed grilling aficionado and a BBQ purist, I don't typically use anything but hardwood lump coal and a match, but I thought I'd give this a try. Simply put, this mat is amazing!Great Product. Placed one over the grill side of my Coleman (Gas) Burner/Grill.It is perfect for fish, seafood, and fruits/vegetables,they're actually really easy to clean. Seriously. Just use some elbow grease, a green scratch pad and a bit of soap. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Stevee C.

customer_reviews.title: My gas grill gets warmer then that so not the best for me
customer_reviews.text: The work well but I didn't pay attention to the max heat that they can take. 450-500f. My gas grill gets warmer then that so not the best for me. But I am going to keep them for tailgate season when I use the charcoal grill. They do seem well made if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: voodoo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Idea !
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of these but they actually work!!! I've only had a chance to use them once so far but I liked them. I cooked a mound of veggies on one side of my gas grill while I cooked kabobs on the other side. The veggies were done in about the same time as the kabobs and were Great! I'll be using these many time this summer I;m sure. What a great product and idea.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning
customer_reviews.text: No more dropping food or sauce unto the grill. Easy to clean, just wait until cool, simply wipe off and all the burned grease will be peel off the grill mat. I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bona P. Purba

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: They work great every time we use them. You still get grill mark's with less chance of burning during flame flares. They clean very easy. I estimate we get 5-6 uses out of each mat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. MI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: used it today burgers with cheese hotdogs chicken kabob veggies..and best of all bacon ..excellent..everything cookeds great ..burgers were moist bacon grease was still on top.. cleanup was easy..rinse off with soap an water..cheese just came right off non stick..ready to reuse
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: VERY EFFECTIVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go on my new grill. I Love them... They are reusable;however, don't over lap the ends because they will stick together and damage a part of the mat... Very easy to clean while you're cooking and afterwards. Your food still has the grilled loom and taste. A must have... Sorry I didn't take a photo, but please take my word...
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Thin enough that you don't lose the grilled flavor, but they keep the food from sticking. Perfect for kabobs, shrimp, etc. I used to have to scrub my grill after each use. These will eliminate the need for that. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great grilling mats!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these mats. I use them every time I grill. They are much easier to clean than the grill itself. I just let them soak for a little bit and the grease and grit comes right off. They are perfect for veggies, mushrooms etc. I put my meat right on the mats and get a great sear without the "char". I have not grilled without them since I got them. May buy more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend - from a heavy grill user
customer_reviews.text: I tell ALL my friends about this awesome product! Everyone loves it! I even fry eggs on it, use it for everything. I was cooking a few pieces of bacon on it at a time but put too many pieces on when I had guests and set the grill on fire - my bad. The mat caught on fire and still came out unscathed. And yes, I'm a blonde. I just didn't think that bacon grease scenario through - might have been the early morning mimosas.....
customer_reviews.author: The Bug

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill mats that do the job.
customer_reviews.text: These grill mats work great at keeping down flareups and keeping foods from sticking. I've tried one three times now and have been very pleased with the results each time. I even tried melting cheese. I do worry a little about their safety, though, since heat and plastic are often not a good pairing. They claim to be "FDA Approved".
customer_reviews.author: Slow Hand Dave

customer_reviews.title: Cleanup is a breeze..
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing.. Got them for Christmas and finally got to use them.. Chicken breast cooked evenly and pineapple was the bomb, not to mention the mushrooms and squash all on the grill.. Very impressed with how they seamed to make the food cook faster and more even. Not to mention the clean-up.. So easy the brown sugar caramelized on the pineapple and didn't stick at all.. Awesome product..
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: OMG. they work. buy them, buy them, buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I love them, love them, love them. I clean them off with the garden hose and a nozzle. You still get the grill marks from the Great. They clean up so easy I wish that I knew of this product years ago.
customer_reviews.author: GrandPa  G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: The first time that I used the grill mat, I prepared grill peppers, onions, and mushrooms sautéed in olive oil. The veggies were perfect and clean-up was a breeze. Previously I used steel trays and sprayed them with Pam... no amount of scrubbing gets them completely clean.. Highly recommend the Grill Mat.We have even found an addition use by lining the bottom of the oven from time to time with dishes, like casseroles, that have a tendency to boil over. The price was right, the packing was great, and the shipment time was right on time. No complaints here for sure! 3 people found this helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelle M.

customer_reviews.title: You will never grill again without the mat.
customer_reviews.text: Would not dream of grilling without these mats. Foods cooks just as if they would placed directly on the grill. What I like most about the mats is that they prevent flame flare ups from grease drippings. Nothing falls through grill. Large enough to cook 6 hamburgers at a time. Easy to clean. 5 pads should last you a lifetime'
customer_reviews.author: Pinkrabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great for doing small items on the grill
customer_reviews.text: My daughters and son in laws love using this on the grill. They say it’s good but they only downside is cleaning it afterwards. It’s sort of a pain, but worth it all things considered.
customer_reviews.author: Pillgri,,

customer_reviews.title: not durable
customer_reviews.text: burned melted and ruined the top of my new glass stove that it was supposed to protect..... I will be consulting my attorney to see if I can come in damages...The stove was not turned on high
customer_reviews.author: steveSaundersMasterJeweler

customer_reviews.title: While it is not perfect, it does a good job
customer_reviews.text: While it is not perfect, it does a good job. I don't understand those reviews that experienced the sheets melting or ripping. Been using the same two sheets over and over and have had no problems. I do use non-stick spray to help it out but it browns the food well and cleans up easily. The grill stays quite clean and that was the purpose of using the sheets. Some foods should be cooked in foil but not all. Have paid more for other brands but this one is the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: noellac

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, Used with steaks and burgers. Steaks were very juicy, I placed on grill to start for the grid lines, then finished cooking on the grill mat. The burgers were juicy and tasty. Cleaning took some elbow grease but worked fine. The set of 5 should last me many years. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Doug F

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for grilling cheese and vegetables
customer_reviews.text: I like to grill some cheese and vegetables. It was a nightmare before, as the cheese would melt through the gill.. and I would have to constantly flip the cheese to prevent the melting. This mat is amazing... I once forgot the cheese there for some 5 minutes, and it was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Andressa

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I tried it out the same day ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I tried it out the same day I received it. I grill pork chops and vegetables. It worked as advertised. I was able to put a nice brown on my pork chops and vegetables. Clean up was very easy. Soap, water, and a sponge took care of almost every. I charred a little spot under my pork chop. A little rubbing with the green side of my scotch pad took care of it with no apparent damage.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning, no messy grill
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I used it to grill rib eye, salmon, asparagus, corn, and other veggies. I used 2 to cover my 3 burner gas grill and it saved me from doing a lot of cleaning afterwards. Now I enjoy grilling more often! Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: dice6

customer_reviews.title: I love having these silicone mats
customer_reviews.text: I love having these silicone mats, for some reason I thought that they were thicker but they're really not much thicker than paper. They're not the thick jelly silicone mats which is what I thought. They still work really well though and you can wash and reuse them, cut to fit a certain pan of your preference and they hold up decently
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kinney

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, the best, thickest non-stick mat! We've purchased many of these non-stick liners over the past 20 years and we just found this brand - our new favorite! We use them as cookie sheet liners and they save a ton of time in clean-up - no need to waste foil or cooking spray. Set of 5 - dishwasher safe. Everything is true: amazing value, heavy duty, safe, easy clean-up and versatile. They can be cut to the size you need and can be used to line small appliances like toaster ovens. Resistant up to 500 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and excellent product! I used it in oven and out fire. And i dried onions!
customer_reviews.author: HK customer

customer_reviews.title: Much cleaner!!
customer_reviews.text: We are working on our second package of these. So nice when using a communal BBQ so you don't have to worry about what someone else used before you. Or, you don't need to clean your own BBQ before (or after) using these. In general, much cleaner!! And food doesn't stick!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product because I was sick of things sticking to the grill. Little did I know I would fall in love with this product! I cooked chicken wings on it and because of it own oils it came our crispy and delicious, I've made salmon on it and it cooked perfectly! Keeps my grill clean and it's so easy to clean! Great product I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: christina1030

customer_reviews.title: Won't grill without them
customer_reviews.text: We love these. We are on our third box and always keep them on hand now. They significantly reduce flareups but without inhibiting the grilling flavor. They fit perfectly on our Nexgrill and last for quite a few uses. I suppose you could clean them but we just replace them occasionally instead of the mess. They keep the burners and cooking grate significantly cleaner as well. In turn, the grill has lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G.

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertized
customer_reviews.text: After using these three or four times I am fan. They are easy to use, reduce grill mess and actually improves flavor of the food. Using them 100% of the time on both propane and wood grills.
customer_reviews.author: 427Cobra

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Does not clean well. Burned juice from meats and vegetables stick to and burn on mat and cannot be cleaned. When using a soft brush to try and clean, the mat ripped. In my opinion, this was a waste of my money. Lucky to get two uses out of one mat. Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Garlitz

customer_reviews.title: Good idea!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve cooked meat, seafood and veggies on the mat and all have turned out well. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marylyn A Durie

customer_reviews.title: Works good food won't stick to grill
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to use, a little flimsy, but did what it was supposed to do keep grease and fat from flaring up. When cooking a steak it don't leave grill marks which would be nice but keeps food from sticking to grill. 5 come in a pack and are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sabia

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Great heat distribution, you still get grill marks, clean up is no longer a chore. Your food does not fall thru the grate! I never grill without them.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Winger

customer_reviews.title: Works great and no mess
customer_reviews.text: Oh! My what an invention! Have a gas grill, what ever I am cooking no longer sticks to the grill but get these wonderful grill marks and everything cooks evenly.. Wait until it cools a bit and take off the grill clean up is a snap, chicken does not get dried out when using these mats!
customer_reviews.author: Jinny12

customer_reviews.title: 100% Non-stick BBQ Grill & Baking Mats
customer_reviews.text: These pads are exactly as described. I bought a set for our oven and our barbecue. I used two sheets for each one. they catch drips perfectly and prevent flare-ups from grease in the barbecue. Cleanup is a snap, just soap and water. The heat has no effect on these pads. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Greenberg

product_meta.title: Aoocan Grill Mat - Set of 5 Heavy Duty BBQ Grill Mats Non Stick, BBQ Grill & Baking Mats - Reusable, Easy to Clean Barbecue Grilling Accessories - Work on Gas Charcoal Electric - Extended Warranty
feature_bullets: A FAVORITE OF BARBECUE LOVERS.Our grill mats can keeps your food from falling between the grates or sticking to the grill!,and oil drips onto the wood carbon to create smoke.Our grill mat is very smooth and will not stick to food easily,It makes you look like a pro ,enjoy a better barbecue.

EASY TO CLEAN & HIGH TEMPERATURE RESISANT.Our grill mat is very easy to clean. When you finish the barbecue, you just need to wash it with clean water and dry it in the sun. Then you don't need to worry about dirty barbecue grill.They can withstand temperatures up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit and will not burn. Keep your family safe with a brand you can trust.

SECURITY ASSURANCES.It has passed LFGB food-grade certification, which is harmless to food and makes your diet healthier.Thicker grill mats dose not mean better. We have tested it numerous times to get the best thickness we can get at the moment, and to ensure enough heat resistance so that the food you grill will still tastes better.

MULTIPURPOSE--While you're baking or microwaving your food, you can also use our grill mat instead of a plate to keep food from falling off and contaminating your device. It can be reused and has a long service life of at least 100 times. No need to others barbecue MATS.

BEST OF ALL - Best value in bbq grill accessories! If you're not completely satisfied, we'll make it right or your money back. Why wait? Try yours RISK FREE! Warning: do not let grease accumulate due to risk of grease fire. If you have any question about it, just tell us and we will provide you a satisfied solution.
